name: LIBERTY DENTAL PLAN CORPORATION
sampleDescriptions: Support the inclusion of dental care services in Medicare
Support the expansion of Medicare to include dental coverage. No specific legislation.
Support the expansion of Medicare to include dental coverage. Support inclusion of dental benefits under Medicare in H.R. 5376 - Build Back Better Act.
